dimensions.label: Structure
dimensions.description: Preference for checklists, templates, and orderly workflows vs opportunistic exploration.

dimensions.label: Verification
dimensions.description: How strongly you prefer source-citing / reproduction before claiming something works.

dimensions.label: Abstraction
dimensions.description: Preference for hands-on doing vs strategy, modeling, and coordination.

dimensions.label: Risk tolerance
dimensions.description: Willingness to try brittle or unusual tactics vs safer, standard approaches.

dimensions.label: Communication
dimensions.description: Communication style: story/accessible vs compact technical detail.

dimensions.label: Collaboration
dimensions.description: Preference for working interactively with others vs shipping polished summaries.
